PropertyDefinition.Description: Total number of VTR replay errors
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP VTR Error Count

PropertyDefinition.Description: Total number of PSE analysis failures
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP PSE Failure Count

PropertyDefinition.Description: Total number of DigiBeta dropouts detected
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP DigiBeta Dropout Count

PropertyDefinition.Description: Total number of Timecode break events
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Timecode Break Count

PropertyDefinition.Description: The technical code describing the method or recording of this element. E.g. 'LTO', 'D3' (Infax table T_RECORDING, item tech_code)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Format

PropertyDefinition.Description: Indicates the series the programme is related to. E.g. 'OLD GREY WHISTLE TEST' (Infax table T_PROGRAMME, item series_title)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Programme Title

PropertyDefinition.Description: The title of this programme. E.g. 'PICK OF THE YEAR'(Infax table T_PROGRAMME, item core_title)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Episode Title

PropertyDefinition.Description: Earliest transmission date E.g. 1978-01-05 (Infax table T_PROGRAMME, item fst_aptx_date)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Transmission Date

PropertyDefinition.Description: Programmes are identified by a programme number and optionally a magazine prefix, which consists of a letter, ranging from A to Z. E.g. 'A'(Infax table T_PROGRAMME, item mag_prefix)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Magazine Prefix

PropertyDefinition.Description: A number, which in conjunction with the magazine prefix, uniquely identifies a programme. It never changes and stays with the programme throughout its life.E.g. LNF2073N (Infax table T_PROGRAMME, item prog_num)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Programme Number

PropertyDefinition.Description: This is a code to describe the recording status of spool items.E.g. 'M'(Infax table T_RECORDING, item rec_status
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Spool Status

PropertyDefinition.Description: The date on which this element was recorded onto the spool item. E.g. 2008-04-17 (Infax table T_RECORDING, item rec_date)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Stock Date

PropertyDefinition.Description: A free format text containing a technical description of the recording. E.g. 'PROGRAMME (DUB OF 005123) (Infax table T_RECORDING, item rec_vt_desc)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Spool Descriptor

PropertyDefinition.Description: The catalogue description of the recording. (Infax table T_RECORDING, item rec_cat_desc)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Memo

PropertyDefinition.Description: The amount of material used. This is recorded as duration in number of seconds. E.g. 4145 (Infax table T_RECORDING, item rec_duration)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Duration

PropertyDefinition.Description: The numeric component of a spool number. The number and prefix form a spool-number which is usually issued when the material is created. The spool number equates to a gap in the short term store. The number on the spool identifies the last current number for the spool. E.g. 'DA 005123'(Infax table T_SPOOL, item spl_prefix and spl_num)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Spool Number

PropertyDefinition.Description: The accession number identifies a number given to an item being added to the library's long term store system. This number equates to a space on a storage shelf and is therefore a reusable storage identifier.E.g. 'DA 018820'(Infax table T_SPOOL, item acc_prefix and acc_num)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Accession Number

PropertyDefinition.Description: A code which allows the user to retrieve catalogue entries by a category. It is a subcatalogue within the catalogue.E.g. 'LONPROG' (Infax table T_CAT_ITEM, item cat_recall)
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Catalogue Detail

PropertyDefinition.Description: The production code assigned to the programme. E.g. 70
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Production Code

PropertyDefinition.Description: Index of the item on the videotape containing multiple items E.g. 1
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Item Number

PropertyDefinition.Description: The value of the red flash analysis, scaled by a factor of 1000.
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Red Flash

PropertyDefinition.Description: The value of the luminance flash analysis, scaled by a factor of 1000
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Luminance Flash

PropertyDefinition.Description: The value of the spatial analysis, scaled by a factor of 1000.
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Spatial Pattern

PropertyDefinition.Description: The extended warning failure flag
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Extended Failure

PropertyDefinition.Description: Error code reported by the VTR
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP VTR Error Code

PropertyDefinition.Description: Normalised Digibeta dropout strength
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Strength

PropertyDefinition.Description: Flags which timecode types are associated with this event
PropertyDefinition.Name: APP Timecode Type
